data.name: 魔法少女は自由に変身できない。 Demo
data.detailed_description:
Magical girl 3D action shooting that can only transform for 15 seconds
When the time comes, it will transform and be released.
You can rampage during the transformation.

You can play the first 3 stages.
Saved data will not be taken over.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
